title: Linux ftpshut Command with Practical Examples
description: Explore the ftpshut command in Linux, learn how to shut down the FTP server, and discover techniques for scheduling automatic FTP server shutdown.

meta.title: Linux ftpshut Command with Practical Examples
meta.description: Explore the ftpshut command in Linux, learn how to shut down the FTP server, and discover techniques for scheduling automatic FTP server shutdown.
meta.keywords: Linux, ftpshut, FTP server, shutdown, scheduling, network administration

verify.name: Verify ftpshut command
verify.hint: The ftpshut command did not successfully shut down the FTP server. Please check the output of the ftpshut command and try again.

verify.name: Verify FTP server shutdown
verify.hint: The FTP server is still running. Please check the output of the ftpshut command and try again to shut down the FTP server.

verify.name: Verify scheduled FTP server shutdown
verify.hint: The automatic FTP server shutdown does not appear to have been scheduled correctly. Please check the output of the ftpshut command and try again.
